name: .CRYPT12 File Extension
summary: Learn about .CRYPT12 files and view a list of programs that open them.

instructions: You can use a CRYPT12 file to migrate or restore your WhatsApp message history on an Android device. To do so, you must rename your most recent CRYPT12 file to msgstore.db.crypt12 before reinstalling WhatsApp and, when prompted, manually restoring your message history.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
